question_content.description:
### Problem19


- _____(0)\___ are the basic abstract building blocks of formal languages.  
- An _____(1)\___ is a finite set of symbols.  
- A _____(2)\___ is a finite sequence of alphabet symbols.  
- A _____(3)\___ _____(4)\___ is a set of strings (possibly infinite), all over the same alphabet.

See more examples of formal languages over the binary alphabet, ASCII alphabet, palindromes alphabet etc. in textbook pp.719-722.
question_content.author: Yike Guo
